title: Michael Warren on LinkedIn: Vaccines Are Profoundly Effective, and We Can't Stop There
author: Michael Warren
description: Vaccines are effective. Vaccines prevent illness. Vaccines save lives. Vaccines save money. Honored to co-author this commentary in Pediatrics with my HRSA...
cleaned_text: Maternal and Child Health Bureau at Health Resources and Services Administration (HRSAgov), HHS Vaccines are effective. Vaccines prevent illness. Vaccines save lives. Vaccines save money. Honored to co-author this commentary in Pediatrics with my HRSA MCHB colleague [Monique Fountain Hanna, MD, MPH, MBA](https://www.linkedin.com/in/monique-fountain-hanna-md-mph-mba-904b0310?trk=public_post-text). We can't rest on the laurels of vaccine efficacy. We must actively address misinformation and assure equity in vaccine administration. [#vaccines](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fvaccines&trk=public_post-text)
